title: Is it permissible to work in kafir owned businesses? - #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: foreign I recently have reached the age where I have more open opportunities to get jobs and there's one that I really want to work at since it's really close to my school and I can walk to it is a Christian owned and I wonder if there's any restrictions to working there is no problem in working for a Christian or a Jew or an atheist or whatever denomination providing that the job description is halal and what you're doing and the earning is halal so with him worked for some time under the supervision and the ownership of a Jew to earn Salman farisi did this some of the companions also did this and there's no problem providing that the work itself is halal and Allah Knows Best
